Sketches of Carts and Horses

Title
Sketches of Carts and Horses
Object type
Drawing
Genre
Study
Date
ca. 1602-ca. 1605
Height (cm)
14.5
Width (cm)
20.2
Support
Paper
Drawing medium
Pen and brown ink, light brown wash, framing lines in pen and gray ink
Our attribution
Jan Brueghel the Elder
Other attribution authorities
Bailey/Walker cat. #MOSC.PU.1
Bailey/Walker
MOSC.PU.1
Collection type
Public
Location (collection)
Pushkin Museum
Location or most recent sale notes
4658
Bibliography
Massaloff 1917, p. 300, nr. 34 (as Jan Brueghel I); Sidorov 1930, p. 232 (as Jan Brueghel I); Moscow 1959, p. 22 (as Jan Brueghel I); Prague 1986-87, nr. 28 (as Jan Brueghel I); Sadkov 2001, p. 73-74, nr. 78, ill. (as Jan Brueghel I); Sadkov 2010, p. 81
Exhibition history
Prague 1986-87, nr. 28 (as Jan Brueghel I)
Provenance
1909Sale (Gutbier Dealer)
1909Russia MoscowBought by Nikolay Semyonovich Mosolov (Lugt 1524 for 100 marks)
1914Russia MoscowBequeathed by Mosolov to the Rumyantsev Museum (Lugt 1524)
1924Transferred to the Museum of Fine Arts (since 1937 Pushkin Museum)
Genre
Study
Tags
Horse, Cart
